start: ^You stand at the edge of the Whispering Woods, clutching your backpack. A faint trail leads into the trees.
^Will you step bravely into the shadows, or look around for clues first?

c-0: ^The forest feels alive. You continue traveling but you notice your compass not working and find yourself to be lost on the current trail you're on.
c-1: ^You part the branches carefully and find a crumpled map on the ground!
c-2: ^You freeze. The noise stops. Nothing moves.
^You shake it off and keep going, but a strange chill lingers.
c-3: ^You circle the area and notice a crumpled map tucked under a stone.

crossroads: ^You reach a fork in the path. One trail is dark and overgrown; the other is well-worn but eerily silent.

c-0: ^The path is difficult, but your courage pushes you onward.

b: ^With courage and a map, you find the lost treasure of the woods!
^The woods confuse you and you find yourself back at the start, but safe.

good_ending: ^You return home with stories and the treasure in your backpack. Adventure complete!
bad_ending: ^You leave the forest, but the mystery remains unsolved. Maybe next time!
